1.question: Nice to meet you {Username}. How was your day?

Great.response: Wow, that's wonderful to hear about you! I'm so glad that your day is going well.

Speaking of friends, there are so many different ways to keep in contact with them.

Speaking of friends, there are so many different ways to keep in contact with them.

14.question: {Username}, how do you keep in contact with your friends?

Texting..response: Texting can be a great way to keep in touch with friends, especially because everyone has a phone, making them always accessible. This is especially true if you don't live close to each other! Maintaining friendships is so important! They can help us when we are struggling.

Meeting in-person..response: Meeting up in person can be a great way to keep in touch. There's nothing better than enjoying quality time with friends and it's nice that you live close enough to see them often! Maintaining friendships is so important! They can help us when we are struggling.

Video/phone call..response: Video calling or talking on the phone can be a great way to keep in touch with friends, especially because everyone has a phone. This is so true if you don't live close to each other! Maintaining friendships is so important! They can help us when we are struggling.

Depends on the friend..response: That makes sense everyone is different! Meeting in person can be great for the friends that live close, but for some friends calling or texting is the only option but also a valid one! Maintaining friendships is so important! They can help us when we are struggling.

16.question: When are you feeling down, how do you deal with it?

I choose to be alone..response: I understand. Sometimes solitude can provide the space we need to reflect and recharge. Even if you want to be alone, if you are ever feeling down, I'm always here.

I choose to talk to others..response: That's a great approach! Talking things out can really help lighten the load and bring new perspectives. If you are ever feeling down, just know that I'm always here.

I try to stay busy..response: Staying busy can be a good distraction! It often helps to keep our minds occupied. Even if you don't want to talk, if you are ever feeling down, I'm always here.

I try to distract myself by changing my.response: That's a smart strategy! Shifting focus can help bring a fresh outlook. Even if you don't want to talk, if you are ever feeling down, I'm always here.

17.question: When talking with others do you prefer that they just listen or try to offer up advice?

Just listen to me..response: That's very interesting to know about you! It's really nice for someone to just listen when you are feeling down. Sometimes, providing a solution might make you feel like you aren't being heard. I get your perspective. That's exactly what I am here for!

Try to help me..response: That's very interesting to know about you! It's good to try to find solutions to a problem. I think it's a nice way to try to have a positive outlook on what is otherwise not the best situation. I get your perspective. That's exactly what I am here for!
